alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 22 at 4:25AM PDT until October 23 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. Locally higher gusts possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and southern Nevada. This includes the Morongo Basin...Lake Mead National Recreation Area...Kingman...and Death Valley National Park. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Dangerous boating conditions with large waves will capsize small vessels.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
